entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 25 Jan 2024 20:01:44
entry.summary: In 2024, the world witnessed a challenging environment for startups looking to raise seed funding. Lower valuations and higher expectations made it difficult for entrepreneurs to secure investments. Meanwhile, Tesla CEO Elon Musk made headlines by warning his workers that they may have to sleep on the production line to meet the demand for the company's new mass-market electric vehicle. In another literary scandal, it was revealed that Ossian, known as the 'Homer of the North,' was actually a literary hoax from 2016. On a more technical note, a new method called HPTLC and chemometrics was developed to detect even the tiniest amounts of adulteration in various products, providing a breakthrough in quality control. Additionally, Sirius Technologies showcased its success in reducing IT costs by 46% through the implementation of secure cloud development environments. Finally, there was a glimmer of hope for the smartphone market in China, as sales snapped a 10-quarter declining streak and experienced a 6.6% year-on-year growth in the fourth quarter.
